metadata.title: CVE-2022-25255 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - medium.
metadata.description:
In Qt 5.9.x through 5.15.x before 5.15.9 and 6.x before 6.2.4 on Linux and UNIX, QProcess could execute a binary from the current working directory when not found in the PATH.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-25255` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libqt5concurrent5 - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
libqt5core5a - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
libqt5dbus5 - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
libqt5gui5 - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
libqt5network5 - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
libqt5opengl5 - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
libqt5printsupport5 - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
libqt5sql5 - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
libqt5sql5-ibase - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
libqt5sql5-mysql - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
libqt5sql5-odbc - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
libqt5sql5-psql - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
libqt5sql5-sqlite - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
libqt5sql5-tds - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
libqt5test5 - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
libqt5widgets5 - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
libqt5xml5 - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
qt5-flatpak-platformtheme - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
qt5-gtk-platformtheme - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
qt5-qmake - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
qt5-qmake-bin - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
qt5-xdgdesktopportal-platformtheme - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
qtbase5-examples - 5.15.6+dfsg-1
No subscription required

notes.note: mdeslaur> introduced by: https://codereview.qt-project.org/gitweb?p=qt%2Fqtbase.git;a=commit;h=28666d167aa8e602c0bea25ebc4d51b55005db13 which seems to have been introduced in Qt 5.10, not 5.9 as the CVE description suggests.

criterions.comment: qt6-base package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
qtbase-opensource-src package in kinetic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.15.6+dfsg-1').
